message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you a decent amount to get us started.
I'll start with a 50/50 split. Your turn!
I'm not sure about a 50/50 split. Can you offer something better?
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share this time, but I still want to keep a majority of the money.
I'll try to take a larger share this time. Your turn to decide!
I'm not comfortable with a 40/60 split. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want to keep a slight majority of the money.
I'll take a bigger share this time, but I'm still willing to compromise. Your turn to decide!
80% for you is too much. I'm not willing to give up that much.
I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I'm not going to give up too much.
I'll take a significant majority of the money this time. Your turn to decide!
10% is too little for me. I'd rather try to negotiate again.
I'm willing to give you a large share, but I'm not going to give up everything.
I'll take almost all of the money this time. You can have a small share.
5% is too little for me. I'd rather try to negotiate again.
I'm willing to give you a large share, but I'm not going to give up everything.
I'll take almost all of the money this time. You'll get a tiny share.
I'd rather not accept anything, but I don't have a better offer. Let's play again sometime!
